sentences.en: Add also the carrots and celery, saute for 3 more minutes.

sentences.en: Add bay leaf and vegetables expect celery. Simmer until soft.

sentences.en: Besides celery, what dish still can fall blood pressure?

sentences.en: Chop the celery and add it to the salad.

sentences.en: Instead of snacking on crisps and chocolate, nibble on celery or carrot.

sentences.en: The celery is fresh and crisp.

trans.tran_en: a vegetable with long pale green stems that you can eat cooked or uncooked
